Name: Estonian North Wind and the Sun Corpus v.1.0.3
Description:
This corpus contains recordings of the tale "Põhjatuul ja päike" (North Wind and the Sun) read by the same speakers who participated in the Phonetic Corpus of Estonian Spontaneous Speech.
The corpus is available for download from META-SHARE (CELR distribution).
Annotation: word segmentation and phonemes in SAMPA
Group: Corpora with transcriptions and audio recordings
